thread.section_title: Dresslink 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslink 的点评意见 | dresslink.com
thread.title: Bozhidara

author: Bozhidara
title: Bozhidara
text:
I ordered a hat on 24th of December 2017. The order was paid right away.
They answered order was received, sand my order number and tracking number. I haven't resieved anything so far.I sand to the service a lot of e-mails. They first answered I had to be patient. The last their answer
was that I had to resieve my percel and adviced me to check out in my
local post office.I checked out but they said it wasn't received the parcel
with such tracking number.I insist on to resieve the hat, or to refund the
Money.
